Articles.Content:
Year 2436.1: Hypocritical animal rights activists protest against the burning of baby krakens

Edited February 20, 2014 by bazookagrunt

2436.5.1: No one showed up to work anywhere.

2436.5.15: No one showed up to work anywhere.

2436.5.24: 75% of the working population returned to work.

2436.5.31: The LADEE is launched to the Mun.

Edited February 20, 2014 by Designer225

2437: The BKD company states that "The BKDs were never meant for use in a vacuum environment. Also, the name BKD is slightly misleading: it refers to the smaller occurrence of another, much more severe physics anomaly. The BKDs are not sentient. They are machines, which has been known for quite some time."

2438: Research begins on a Kraken drive. Also, an advanced machine is found in the form of a blue telephone booth. The Kerbals attempt to start it up. The machine explodes, ruining the Labratory it was in. Expeditions begin that will work to find more anomalies.
2450: Lots of years after developing TV kerbals develop newspapers. Right after this they develop the internet.
2455: Kerbin's 3rd Ice Age began.
2456: Air conditioning is invented.
2457: Tiger Kerman dubs his new special purpose kolf swing the "Kraken Drive." Carried away, he proceeds to also create the Kraken Putt and Kraken Chip.
2460: The Temperature of Kerbin dropped to around 1 degree Celsius.
2461: As the temperature lowers civilians begin to panic. The snow caused by the ice age is causing food shortages and power outages. Riots are becoming more and more common.

2461.5: Meanwhile, wildlife flourished around the Equator. Elsewhere and everywhere, the ecosystem is beginning to adapt this sudden change.

2462: The Kerbals developed a way to farm (and provide plenty of oxygen, as well as creating their own ecosystem) by creating the greenhouses. Hope the trouble would end. Meteorologist Paul Kerman (based on real life Paul Deanno) said that: "The Ice Age might not end until possibly 2000 years later. Perhaps longer."

Edited February 20, 2014 by Designer225

2490: After lots of harsh years with a little of food on every single day, with almost no morale, without electricity in most devices, with phones barely working, Kerbals start to develop some new ways of communication. Underground electric plants and farms are built and infromation is also transported underground by something called "light ropes" they are taking infromations from computers in undeground houses to other computers in undeground houses. It is called "K-mail".

2495: despite the Ice age, the expeditions for the strange anomalies continue. A satellite picks up a source of radiation under a glacier. the team heads out to dig it up. They find a stainless-steel, four wheeled vehicle similar to an automobile, with strange modifications, including a small reactor on the back and large vents. The Vehicle, dubbed anomaly "#088" is brought to deep storage for later examination.

2500: A plan is hatched to stop the deep freeze. Fusion weapons are developed and lugged to an active geothermal hot spring, sitting at the top of a mountain. The 20 Gigaton payload is detonated, blasting a massive crater into the ground that stretches hundreds of miles across. The heat created by the blast combined with the potentially volatile volcano causes other volcanoes to erupt and heat up the planet. The ice begins receding as the temperature rises globally. It will take roughly 15 years for the ice to recede. Kerbals begin moving up out of the ground.
2510: The temperature rised faster than scientist predicted and it rised so much that temperatures on ecuastor went over 70 degrees of Kelsius. Damn.
2510.12: Then it drops to 5 degree Celsius. Some predict the ice age will last for another 490 years. Despite this there are no major panics.

3000.12: The Ice Age stills going, some kerbals say it might last for more 600 years.

3014: Still going, some kerbals say the temperature is going down slowly, it is now near -10 degree Celsius.

3014.4: Kerbals create the Ice-Age Olympic Games.

Edited February 21, 2014 by EuSouONumero345

Wah! Really? Nothing happened in those 500 years? There must be something!

2600: Kerbals develop super-heavy water which is drinkable and does not freeze under 0 Kelsius, but under -70 Kelsius. It is called Kvodka.

2845: "By pressing random buttons, Stanley entered the right password. A hidden door opened behind him. Amazing!"

2901: The ice age is getting colder at equator it is now - 2 Kelsius.

Time to sum up:

2510.12: Then it drops to 5 degree Celsius. Some predict the ice age will last for another 490 years. Despite this there are no major panics.
Wah! Really? Nothing happened in those 500 years? There must be something!

2600: Kerbals develop super-heavy water which is drinkable and does not freeze under 0 Kelsius, but under -70 Kelsius. It is called Kvodka.

2845: "By pressing random buttons, Stanley entered the right password. A hidden door opened behind him. Amazing!"

2901: The ice age is getting colder at equator it is now - 2 Kelsius.

3000.12: The Ice Age stills going, some kerbals say it might last for more 600 years.

3014: Still going, some kerbals say the temperature is going down slowly, it is now near -10 degree Celsius.

3014.4: Kerbals create the Ice-Age Olympic Games.

3016: The equator is still cold, but the average temperature is no lower than 10 degree Celsius.

3020: Some astronomers predicted that Kerbol is undergoing a change that lowers the heat given from the star. Some predicted that in 1000 years the solar activity will increase, and possibly end the ice age 1200 years after today. As a short-term effect the Kerbal News Network foresaw the lowest views ever.

3021: An ancient stone tablet is found dating back at least 500 years. It is difficult to translate, as it includes a letter used by the ancients that is very similar to the modern letter "K", but isn't technically the same letter. It details a widespread plague and the Kerbals' heroic efforts to kure it.

3022: K-pop is invented and shortly thereafter is the basis for every kanime theme song.

3030: The Kerbal News Network is nearly bankrupt after 10 years of low views on their channels, until they reported that mass production of foods have begun and are providing the Kerbals what they really needed. It reached to the highest views after that report.

3035: Temperatures everywhere on planet are under 0 Kelsius, and plants are for some reason not growing. Kerbals are trying to find something other to eat, but the only living creatures on Kerbin are T.R.E.E.S and Kerbals. They start to develop crappy-tasting synthetical food. (It tastes just like poo)
3036: Mycoprotein is invented, leading to slightly better synthetic food.

3100: Temperature began to warm up, but the ice age won't end until 900 years later.

3123: Kerbals began eating photosynthetic bacteria.
Year 3125: Greatly Edible Round Mints are enlarged and made harmless. Kerbals then eat the 'Germs'. They taste fresh and minty. Everything is then served with 'Germs'.

3125.5: Lolkats are invented when a certain Kerbal posts a picture of his kat on the kinternet featuring a kaption reading "I kan haz Kheezburger?"

3126: Nyan Kat, an animated image of a kat with a GERM for a body flying through space and apparently propelled by rainbows, appears on the kinternet and goes viral. A few rocket scientists begin researching rainbow drives.

3130: Most rocket scientists just decided that rainbow propelling is indeed possible. But it wouldn't actually be rainbows, rather photons, and it has very small thrust, and needs a complicated engine, and... Well they need to think a bit.
